Hester Henriette Grové (née Venter) (Septemba 26, 1922 - Disemba 15, 2009) bụ onye odee South Africa sitere na Africa. Ọ lụrụ onye nkatọ edemede A.P
A maara ya nke ọma maka obere akụkọ ya na egwuregwu ya
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ode akwụkwọ ole na ole nwetagoro ihe nrite Hertzog n'ọtụtụ edemede
Ihe nkiri redio bụ ọnụ ụzọ iko na afọ ọma
Akụkọ dị mkpirikpi bụ Swart Haan, anakọtara dịka ọmụmaatụ "Moderne Afrikaanse Verhaalkuns", nke Dr
